title: Mr. Bug Goes to Town (1941)
description: This is a breakdown of the notations made by the Fleischer Studui for the film "Mr. Bug Goes to Town". The data is created as part of a research project by Juan Camilo González (info@juancgonzalez.com). The purpose is entierly educational.

scenes.description:
Fire! Destruction Fast Pace 
 Visually exciting.
Establishing story significance. Humor. Possible flavor of the past.
Fire, suspence, fast action (keystone pace), fast humor, tension, danger to honey, Hoppity makes rescues.
Establishing main characters. Reaction to fire, crowd dispersing.
All attention on the main story triangle.
Beetle and Hoppity in light humor (but characteristic) defeat and victory. Situations... Fast moving situations.
Picnic flavor jolted with impersonal human intrusion. Then fast pace visually exciting - Some suspense spots climated with hoppity getting honey. Out of danger. (Fast gags)
